snippet.title: Fishy | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Fishy is a visual novel about friends, enemies, acceptance, and the monsters waiting for us in the deep blue void. Play as a middle schooler who's a little different from their classmates. Explore the aquarium, face your fears, and maybe make a friend.

Fishy features 583 individual hand-drawn sea creatures and an atmospheric original score.

A lovingly crafted bite-sized journey, Fishy is best experienced when played in one sitting (roughly 30 minutes).

Available on itch.io
https://i-choose-paradise.itch.io/fishy
